sentences.sContent: He longed to see her again.
She longed for the chance to speak to him in private.
sentences.sCn: 她渴望有机会和他私下交谈。

phrases.pCn: adj. 长期的（持久的）；长时间；好久好久

words.tran: 长度，长；时间的长短；（语）音长

trans.tranOther: to want something very much, especially when it seems unlikely to happen soon
